body:
**What did you do?**

Use Prometheus 2.21.0 with Spring Cloud Netflix Eureka SD.

**What did you expect to see?**

Successfully refreshed targets from Eureka SD.

**What did you see instead? Under which circumstances?**

Refresh error `strconv.ParseInt: parsing \"1600761615607\": value out of range`

**Environment**

* System information:

	Windows 10

* Prometheus version:

	prometheus, version 2.21.0 (branch: HEAD, revision: e83ef207b6c2398919b69cd87d2693cfc2fb4127)
          build user:       root@a4d9bea8479e
          build date:       20200911-11:51:17
          go version:       go1.15.2

* Prometheus configuration file:
```
global:
  scrape_interval:     15s 
  evaluation_interval: 15s


scrape_configs:
  - job_name: 'eureka'
    eureka_sd_configs:
      - server: http://localhost:8761/eureka
```

* Logs:
```
level=error ts=2020-09-22T08:22:16.073Z caller=refresh.go:98 component="discovery manager scrape" discovery=eureka msg="Unable to refresh target groups" err="\"http://localhost:8761/eureka/apps\": strconv.ParseInt: parsing \"1600761615607\": value out of range"
```

* Eureka API response
```json
{
    "applications": {
        "versions__delta": "1",
        "apps__hashcode": "UP_1_",
        "application": [
            {
                "name": "PROMETHEUS-DEMO-APP",
                "instance": [
                    {
                        "instanceId": "localhost:prometheus-demo-app",
                        "hostName": "localhost",
                        "app": "PROMETHEUS-DEMO-APP",
                        "ipAddr": "192.168.0.100",
                        "status": "UP",
                        "overriddenStatus": "UNKNOWN",
                        "port": {
                            "$": 8080,
                            "@enabled": "true"
                        },
                        "securePort": {
                            "$": 443,
                            "@enabled": "false"
                        },
                        "countryId": 1,
                        "dataCenterInfo": {
                            "@class": "com.netflix.appinfo.InstanceInfo$DefaultDataCenterInfo",
                            "name": "MyOwn"
                        },
                        "leaseInfo": {
                            "renewalIntervalInSecs": 30,
                            "durationInSecs": 90,
                            "registrationTimestamp": 1600761615607,
                            "lastRenewalTimestamp": 1600763715983,
                            "evictionTimestamp": 0,
                            "serviceUpTimestamp": 1600761615607
                        },
                        "metadata": {
                            "health.path": "/actuator/health",
                            "management.port": "8080",
                            "metrics.path": "/actuator/prometheus",
                            "management.context-path": "/actuator"
                        },
                        "homePageUrl": "http://localhost:8080/",
                        "statusPageUrl": "http://localhost:8080/actuator/info",
                        "healthCheckUrl": "http://localhost:8080/actuator/health",
                        "vipAddress": "prometheus-demo-app",
                        "secureVipAddress": "prometheus-demo-app",
                        "isCoordinatingDiscoveryServer": "false",
                        "lastUpdatedTimestamp": "1600761615607",
                        "lastDirtyTimestamp": "1600761615547",
                        "actionType": "ADDED"
                    }
                ]
            }
        ]
    }
}
```
title: Error refreshing target groups with Eureka SD
